inputFiles.-i: file to be used for network learning
inputFiles.-is: static features to be used for network learning
inputFiles.-mA_dynPast: dynamic nodes from t'<t that must be parents of each Xi[t]
inputFiles.-mA_dynSame: dynamic nodes from t that must be parents of each Xi[t]
inputFiles.-mA_static: static nodes that must be parents of each Xi[t]
inputFiles.-mNotA_dynPast: dynamic nodes from t'<t that cannot be parents of each Xi[t]
inputFiles.-mNotA_dynSame: dynamic nodes from t that cannot be parents of each Xi[t]
inputFiles.-mNotA_static: static nodes that cannot be parents of each Xi[t]
